dimension: overall (Not trimmed): 50 x 49 3/4 in. (127 x 126.37 cm)
title: Paradise (texture)
text:
There is a touch of the artistry of Herni Rousseau in the flaroal prints which are as rich as the vegetation in the African rain forests.
Oddly, Mr. Larsen has avoided the animal theme except in the Rousseauesque <I>Paradise<I> print where the careful observer can find a pair of lion eyes peeping through the foliage.
description: \"A Rousseau Jungle\" stated in 1963 catalogue.Royale cloth. Rust, green, purple, blue Mahogony
